comment:
* Delegate used to provide new implementation of a select few methods of {@link Resources.Theme}
 *
 * Through the layoutlib_create tool, the original  methods of Theme have been replaced
 * by calls to methods of the same name in this delegate class.
 *

methods.name: static TypedArray obtainStyledAttributes(Resources thisResources, Theme thisTheme, int[] attrs)
static TypedArray obtainStyledAttributes(Resources thisResources, Theme thisTheme, int resid, int[] attrs) throws NotFoundException
static TypedArray obtainStyledAttributes(Resources thisResources, Theme thisTheme, AttributeSet set, int[] attrs, int defStyleAttr, int defStyleRes)
static boolean resolveAttribute(Resources thisResources, Theme thisTheme, int resid, TypedValue outValue, boolean resolveRefs)
static TypedArray resolveAttributes(Resources thisResources, Theme thisTheme, int[] values, int[] attrs)
